page.title: 05My impressions of the area.
page.content:
In Moxley most of the land is used for residential or commercial purposes. Most of the old,{disused } houses and factories are being replaced by more modern houses, some areas have houses which are tightly packed. Moxley is not a famous area but the people know of the local landmarks. One such landmark is the {sanna.}This is a canal which backs onto the the Moxley Isolation Hospital. Hence the canal's name, a shortened version of sanatorium. Moxley in my opinion is a{depressing}} area. I think this leads teanagers to smoking, glue-sniffing and vandalism. Teenagers have also taken to creating colourful{graffiti}to decorate walls and buildings. There is little else to do in the area after school finishes.
By Paul Downing.
